description_text: Hello. I’m really curious about your pedals more specifically Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback simsonn.com But I know I can’t wait and know I shouldn’t buy new pedals haha but I have to check if you’re going have any more discounts after Christmas so it might be better to wait? Kind regards.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10800 中
